slide1.title: Discover Professional Chefs
slide1.description: Browse through hundreds of talented chefs in your area. From home cooking to gourmet cuisine, find the perfect chef for any occasion.

slide2.title: Book Your Culinary Experience
slide2.description: Schedule private cooking sessions, catering services, or cooking classes. Choose your menu, date, and let our chefs handle the rest.

slide3.title: Live Cooking at Your Place
slide3.description: Experience restaurant-quality meals in the comfort of your home. Watch professional chefs prepare delicious dishes with fresh ingredients.

slide4.title: Rate & Share Your Experience
slide4.description: Leave reviews, share photos of your meals, and help others discover amazing chefs. Build your culinary community today.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and conditions
termsAndConditions.accept: I accept the terms and conditions
